title: Suspicious Looking Tentacle
summaries: The Suspicious Looking Tentacle is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord light pet-summoning item that spawns the Suspicious Looking Eye, a small tentacled floating eye that provides cyan light and follows the player. The Suspicious Looking Tentacle is always dropped from the Moon Lord's Treasure Bag in Expert Mode.

In addition to providing light, the Suspicious Looking Tentacle senses nearby <linked>NPCs</linked>, <linked>enemies</linked>, treasure (<linked>Pots</linked>, <linked>Chests</linked>, etc.), and <linked>ores</linked> within a 17-tile radius. This is shown via its pupil and iris pointing in the direction of the entity sensed, as well as expanding for treasure and contracting for enemies. The eye will also sparkle when nearby ores and treasures are detected.
